title: Goodbye, General Discussion Boards - Love, Whitney.
body:
It has been many years of anime care-taking in the boards.
Many people I spoke to in the boards are now gone, many moments, many friends.
I'll keep this short. But I hope you all remember the anime threads and the waifus with great joy.

I will cherish my time on the boards, but like all that are now gone it is now my time to move into other things.
My last anime post is going to be this song: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P1vd0z3SLYo

This is my song to you all.

http://www.hxchector.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/sword-art-online-gifs27.gif

I hope that this space continues to be that space where you can come after a long day, just to hangout with your friend or argue about topics with each other, that it continues to be that space that you can call a "home" in the internet. 

Note: If you need to contact me, I will still be on the GD Discord.
